column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've loved this place for a long time. Service is pretty solid
column2: and it's a lively space. The food is consistent
column3: and while everything I've tried is good
column4: there are several must-haves. I love the escargot
column6: and the bacon wrapped dates. Great cheese plates
column7: and good sangria. Purists may tell you these dishes aren't authentic Spanish tapas
column8: but if they taste this good
